projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React.js and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Implemented responsive design and modern UI/UX principles.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and experience. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Features smooth animations, contact form integration, and modern design.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A web-based task management application with features like task creation, editing, categorization, and deadline tracking. Built with modern JavaScript frameworks and local storage for data persistence.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A dynamic weather application that displays current weather conditions and forecasts. Integrated with weather APIs, features location-based weather data, and responsive design for mobile and desktop.
